description: Restores sources from sky model into an input image, writes result to output image. If an output image is not specified, makes a name for it automatically

parameters.name: format
parameters.info: Input format, for ASCII or BBS tables. For ASCII tables, default is 'name ra_h ra_m ra_s dec_d dec_m dec_s i q u v spi rm emaj_s emin_s pa_d freq0 tags...'. For BBS tables, the default format is specified in the file header.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.info: Extract sources with the specified tags.

parameters.name: num-sources
parameters.info: Only restore the NSRC brightest sources

parameters.name: scale
parameters.info: Rescale model fluxes by given factor. If N is given, rescale N brightest only.

parameters.name: restoring-beam
parameters.info: Specify restoring beam size, overriding BMAJ/BMIN/BPA keywords in input image. Use a single value (arcsec) for circular beam, or else supply major/minor size and position angle (deg).

parameters.name: psf-file
parameters.info: Determine restoring beam size by fitting PSF file, overriding BMAJ/BMIN/BPA keywords in input image. 'clear' clear contents of FITS file before adding in sources apply model primary beam function during restoration, if it's defined, and source is not tagged 'nobeam'

parameters.name: beamgain
parameters.info: Apply beamgain atribute during restoration, if it's defined, and source is not tagged 'nobeam' 'ignore-nobeam' apply PB or beamgain even if source is tagged 'nobeam'

parameters.name: freq
parameters.info: Use this frequency (in MHz) (for spectral indices and primary beams)

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.info: Set verbosity level (0 is silent, higher numbers mean more messages)

parameters.name: timestamps
parameters.info: Enable timestamps in debug messages (useful for timing)
